subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Riding an 18-game point-scoring streak, Paul Stastny, a husky 21-year-old center for the Colorado Avalanche, has rocketed into contention for the Calder Trophy.
snippet: Riding an 18-game point-scoring streak, Paul Stastny, a husky 21-year-old center for the Colorado Avalanche, has rocketed into contention for the Calder Trophy.
